thread.title: Sharing Data over Challenging Military Networks
thread.title_full: Sharing Data over Challenging Military Networks

title: Sharing Data over Challenging Military Networks
text:
Sharing Data over Challenging Military Networks 10 September 2015 by iOra Print Email Company Details 
This paper describes the challenges for sharing data in deployed environments and how they are then complicated by the performance of the available military networks in ensuring a consistent and holistic view of data. To mitigate the effect of reduced or unavailable network resources this paper then describes a series of strategies that support information sharing and collaboration. 
For more information, please download this free white paper. Available Downloads
